Articles.Content:
firt thing, thank you for reading this.

theres something i want to be upgraded on Ver. 0.24+

- More Memory Usage (especially for 64bit OS) so if we want to play KSP with much mod, can do with high Graphic Setting.

- Increasing pixels used on Part Texture (so it can be readed with high Graphic Rendering Setting)

- Built-in Easy Mod (for adding or removing, even edit mod textures) because another Mod Editor 'mod' is actually a bit confusing, maybe some GUI would good.

dunno if u (devs) want to add one of these things, but i hope the 0.24+ would be another great features.

all of me.

Regards,

.:[ Maybe ]:.

Welcome to the forums!

I would like to note that a number of the suggestions in your post, including 64-bit support and changes to the way parts are loaded, are both on the What Not To Suggest list because they have been frequently discussed in the past. Therefore, I'm going to be locking this thread.

Have a nice day
